movie.title: Le Samourai
movie.actors: Alain Delon, Francois Perier, Nathalie Delon, Cathy Rosier
movie.plot: Hitman Jef Costello is a perfectionist who always carefully plans his murders and who never gets caught. One night however, after killing a night-club owner, he's seen by witnesses. His efforts to provide himself with an alibi fail and more and more he gets driven into a corner.
